name: Warp Tools
description:
Bring Illustrator’s warping features to Figma.

This premium plugin lets you use Smudge, Bulge, Free transform and 9 more tools for distorting your designs.


See preview here: https://figmawarp.tools


Full list of available tools

Smudge, Twirl, Bulge, Pinch, Free transform, Arc transform, Arc upper transform, Arc lower transform, Arch transform, Flag transform, Fish transform, Wave transform


Free trial

This premium plugin comes as a free trial. You can insert the warped result three times, after that you need to buy the full version to continue using the plugin.


Usage

  • Select the group/frame/layer you want to transform.
  • Run the plugin
  • Transform the design using the tools available.
  • When you’re happy with the result, tap the “Insert” button to place it on the page.
